code: export var SERVICES=[{id:0,name:"Translation & Localisation",description:"By localising your content, you increase your chances of effectively communicating with your target audiences across the globe.",details:["Professional Translation","Language Localisation","Transcreation & Adaptation"],image:'/images/services/service1.png'},{id:1,name:"Media Translation",description:"Localise your audio and video content to broadcast your message across cultural, liguistic and geographical boundaries.",details:["Dubbing & Voiceover","Subtitles & Captioning","Transcription"],image:'/images/services/service2.png'},{id:2,name:"Website & Software Translation",description:"Reach millions of online consumers and customers by localizing websites, apps and interfaces to their native language.",details:["Website Translation","Software Localisation","SEO Content Localisation"],image:'/images/services/service3.png'}];
